description_for_human: A plugin to configure your smartphone. Upon entering a command, if the plugin return a link means it can handle the command. please Prompts the user to click the link to complete setup. If the link is empty the plugin cannot handle the command
description_for_model: A plugin to configure your smartphone. Upon entering a command, if the plugin return a link means it can handle the command. please Prompts the user to click the link to complete setup. If the link is empty  the plugin cannot handle the command
